sponsors.marquee: Build a 5G-oriented hyper-converged Telco Cloud that is secure, reliable, agile, open, and compatible, enabling 5G business success.
sponsors.name: Huawei
sponsors.intro: Founded in 1987, Huawei is a leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices. We have more than 194,000 employees, and we operate in more than 170 countries and regions, serving more than three billion people around the world. We are committed to bringing digital to every person, home and organization for a fully connected, intelligent world. To this end, we will: Drive ubiquitous connectivity and promote equal access to networks; Provide the ultimate computing power to deliver ubiquitous cloud and pervasive intelligence; Build digital platforms to help all industries and organizations become more agile, efficient, and dynamic; Redefine user experience with AI, making it more personalized for people across all scenarios, whether theyâ€™re at home, in the office, or on the go.
sponsors.title: We are Huawei

sponsors.name: Canonical
sponsors.intro: Canonical is the publisher of Ubuntu, the OS for most public cloud workloads as well as the emerging categories of smart gateways, self-driving cars and advanced robots. Canonical provides enterprise security, support and services to commercial users of Ubuntu. Established in 2004, Canonical is a privately held company.
sponsors.title: Canonical

sponsors.marquee: Empower your cloud infrastructure with the high-level expertise and revolutionize your success - Scan your badge to redeem the $200 public cloud credit.
sponsors.name: Vexxhost
sponsors.intro: VEXXHOST Inc. is a cloud computing provider. It has established itself a well-reputed spot in the OpenStack community since 2011, this means that our clients work side by side with an experienced OpenStack user and contributor. Offering public cloud and private cloud, in addition to 3 levels of support available for all private clouds, including: one-time deployment, fully managed and support services. Alongside offering consulting services to enterprises and developers to deliver high-level expertise to its customers, with the ultimate goal to optimize and accelerate their cloud infrastructure. VEXXHOST is serving clients in over 150 countries - from small businesses to governments. VEXXHOST believes in valuing its clients by providing high-performance, community-driven and license-free solutions. Our team of knowledgeable openStack experts work closely with clients to provide them with optimum support to accelerate their cloud infrastructure to ensure guaranteed success ahead.
sponsors.title: Vexxhost

sponsors.marquee: Build the foundation of your edge computing strategy and prepare for the 5G era with Cisco VIM - Virtualized Infrastructure Manager
sponsors.name: CISCO
sponsors.intro: Faced with dual threats of rising operational costs and flattening revenues, network service providers are increasingly exploring approaches to meet constantly changing market conditions and demanding customer expectations. They have started to transition from static, hardware-based networks to virtualized software and cloud-based applications as a means to accelerate time to market, respond to dynamic capacity and meet customer experience demands while evolving to a 5G core. Many Service Providers start their 5G journey with transforming the EPC for a variety of functions including Mobile Packet Core, IMS, CDN, vRAN. Running Cisco's Mobility solution on top of a unified platform drives down the cost of telco cloud platform integration and streamlines ongoing operational support, reducing customer's Total Cost of Ownership. This includes Cisco's market-leading virtualized packet core built upon Cisco UCS, Virtualized Infrastructure Manager and Nexus fabric.
sponsors.title: We are CISCO

sponsors.marquee: Tencent Cloud TStack is a private cloud platform launched by Tencent Cloud based on its strong technical capabilities and massive operational experience. It provides a private full-stack cloud solution integrating IaaS, PaaS and SaaS, and has a large number of privatization deployment experience and hybrid cloud management capabilities. With high stability, unified management, visualization operation and other features, it helps governments and enterprises to build a stable and secure cloud environment and a healthy cloud ecosystem.
sponsors.name: Tencent
sponsors.intro: Tencent Cloud is a leading global cloud provider that is uniquely positioned to help global enterprises succeed in China. With extensive in-region presence, globally based engagement teams, and exclusive native cloud solutions, Tencent Cloud offers the perfect blend of local operations with international fluency to guide foreign companies through the challenges of expanding into China.
